    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Display display)
      At each turn, select a valid action to perform.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the valid action that can be performed in that iteration or null if no valid action is found

      The Pile of bones simply does nothing every turn while counting how many turns it has gone through thus it overrides the Enemy parent method

    • getIntrinsicWeapon

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
      Description copied from class: edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
      Creates and returns an intrinsic weapon. By default, the Actor 'punches' for 5 damage. Override this method to create an Actor with more interesting descriptions and/or different damage.
      Overrides:
      getIntrinsicWeapon in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
      Returns:
      a freshly-instantiated IntrinsicWeapon
